title: Matchmaking please...
body:
Uhmmmm... So I was playing a game of league and while it was loading I decide to check out my opponents I was going to be facing through my active game info on op.gg . 

And I get teamed with a bunch or Bronze 1's and 2's as I haven't been bothered to play ranked and try climb and I get faced with a Diamond 5 and Gold 1 enemies.

Like wth Riot. What sort of matchmaking is this...

replies.body: no challengers or masters. don't complain.
Thats a pret shit gold Summoner and that diamond looked like he just ranked up so if the Diamond was duoing with the bronze or lvl 30 summoner there its prob why he's in your game

But I thought if you duo'd with somebody, you faced slightly harder opponents than you normally would because you have the slight advantage of knowing one another and possibly voice chat. 

Idk...
The ranked w/l ratios are such cancer, anything below 70% uninstall.

> [{quoted}](name=Bipolar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Y2vaP9hT,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-08-05T06:50:18.739+0000)
>
> The ranked w/l ratios are such cancer, anything below 70% uninstall.

so everyone should have a 70% win rate lol.. 50 % of people have to lose every game..
Boosted diamond xD Legit 200 games to get diamond from gold?  seems legit ecks dee
